titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR (PATIENT) - Description

div.p: RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR (PATIENT) is the same as the attribute RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR to indicate if a Restrictive Intervention Post-Incident Review for the PATIENT was held within 48 hours of the incident of a Restrictive Intervention.
